title: Mysterious Love
overview: The plot of the drama "Mysterious Love" about the whimsical and charming theatrical actress Juan Nyanychu, who meets Lee Ten, a cold and arrogant guy with a high ejicus and an I.I. Li Teng saves Yuan's nanny from a dangerous situation. These two have feelings for each other, but are separated because of different paths in life. Five years later, they were reunited and their feelings for each other were rekindled. However, these two face a new danger, working together to uncover the designs of the antagonist.
